triggerTaskOnSave.delay.description: If non-zero, wait for this number of milliseconds before triggering the task

triggerTaskOnSave.restart.description: Kill the task first if it is already running

triggerTaskOnSave.tasks.description: Tasks to associate with file globs, e.g. "build": ["**/*.h","**/*.cpp"]

triggerTaskOnSave.selectedTask.description: Name of the task to run when a file is saved. Uses the defined globs, but overrides the task

triggerTaskOnSave.showNotifications.description: Show popup notifications when tasks start and end

triggerTaskOnSave.showBusyIndicator.description: Show a busy indicator with the current task name on the status bar

triggerTaskOnSave.showStatusBarToggle.description: Show a status bar item allowing the extension to be enabled or disabled

triggerTaskOnSave.resultIndicator.markdownDescription: An `workbench.colorCustomizations` setting Used in conjunction with *triggerTaskOnSave.failureColour* to indicate when a task returns a non-zero exit code, e.g.`statusBar.background`

triggerTaskOnSave.resultIndicatorResetTi.markdownDescription: Number of seconds after which the results indicator is cleared

triggerTaskOnSave.failureColour.markdownDescription: A colour used in combination with *triggerTaskOnSave.resultIndicator* to indicate when a task returns a non-zero exit code. Overwrites the `workbench.colorCustomizations` in workspace settings. When a task completes successfully, the settings is removed.

triggerTaskOnSave.successColour.markdownDescription: A colour used in combination with *triggerTaskOnSave.resultIndicator* to indicate when a task completes successfully (with an exit code of 0). Overwrites the `workbench.colorCustomizations` in workspace settings. When a task completes successfully, the settings is removed.
